alert.note: Alert for Hale (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 11:13PM CDT until May 31 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hale County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1113 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Cotton Center, or 9 miles southeast of Olton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Plainview, Hale Center, Cotton Center and Seth Ward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
